drug.name: 25-desacetylrifapentine
drug.description: 25-desacetylrifapentine is under investigation in clinical trial NCT00023387 (TBTC Study 25PK: Intensive Pharmacokinetic Study of Three Doses of Rifapentine and 25-Desacetyl Rifapentine).

drug-interaction.name: Clopidogrel
drug-interaction.description: The therapeutic efficacy of Clopidogrel can be increased when used in combination with 25-desacetylrifapentine.

drug-interaction.name: Isoniazid
drug-interaction.description: 25-desacetylrifapentine may increase the hepatotoxic activities of Isoniazid.

drug-interaction.name: Mycophenolate mofetil
drug-interaction.description: The serum concentration of Mycophenolate mofetil can be decreased when it is combined with 25-desacetylrifapentine.

drug-interaction.name: Mycophenolic acid
drug-interaction.description: The serum concentration of Mycophenolic acid can be decreased when it is combined with 25-desacetylrifapentine.

drug-interaction.name: Picosulfuric acid
drug-interaction.description: The therapeutic efficacy of Picosulfuric acid can be decreased when used in combination with 25-desacetylrifapentine.

drug-interaction.name: BCG vaccine
drug-interaction.description: The therapeutic efficacy of BCG vaccine can be decreased when used in combination with 25-desacetylrifapentine.

drug-interaction.name: Typhoid vaccine
drug-interaction.description: The therapeutic efficacy of Typhoid vaccine can be decreased when used in combination with 25-desacetylrifapentine.

drug-interaction.description: The metabolism of Esmolol can be increased when combined with 25-desacetylrifapentine.
